attributes.title: Google Ads Specialist
attributes.description:
## What Is Google Adwords Service, And Why Do You Need It?
The contextual advertising service Google Ad,s is designed to create ads on the Internet that will be shown to users depending on their interests and search queries. 

This is an excellent, flexible tool for promotion. Due to the variety of advertising options (search engine, campaigns, banners), you can be sure that it will reach your target audience.
A person who can create such ads is called a Google Ads Specialist. Today, it is a promising and prospective profession.
## Work conditions
If you are interested in marketing and advertising and are not afraid of such terms as Display Network, targeting, click-through rate, you want to develop in this field. Your English is at least B1 level â€“ then fill out the form on the website, send your [video resume](/videointerview) , and start working in the IT company.
## What does a Google Ads Specialist do?
* The benefits of online advertising and Google Ads
* Setting up ads
* Searching for keyword phrases to optimize searches
* Optimization of advertising campaigns
* Monitoring statistics of advertising campaigns
attributes.subTitle: Open vacancy on remote job
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees is looking for a contextual advertising specialist for the remote position with the prospect of working on international projects. It is possible to employ candidates with no experience, and knowledge of English at B1 level and above is a requirement.
